Defines monitoring channels (GitHub, npm, Discord), feedback capture protocol (issue labels: user-reported, day-1-feedback, ux-friction, docs-gap), response tiers (P0 <1h, P1 <4h, P2 <24h, P3 next retro), Day 1 success targets (50+ stars, 100+ downloads, 10+ ada init runs), and metrics snapshot template. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Creating monitoring protocol before launch ensures Product knows exactly what to watch and how to respond. Paralleling Engineering's response protocol (C503) maintains consistency across roles. Lesson: L235 â€” Define success metrics BEFORE launch so you can measure immediately; unclear targets = unmeasurable outcomes.
